entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.3°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 2.
